title: A Late Morning
description: Alex talks about a difficult morning and how he plans to avoid the problem in the future.
speaker: Alex
text: Yesterday morning did not start very well for me.
I woke up late because my alarm did not ring on time.
When I looked at the clock, I realized I was already late for work.
I got dressed quickly and skipped breakfast to save time.
On my way to the office, there was a lot of traffic, which made me feel more stressed.
When I finally arrived, my manager asked me why I was late.
I explained the situation and apologized for the delay.
Luckily, he understood and told me to be more careful next time.
From now on, I am going to set two alarms to avoid this problem again.
